conclusion: Determine total distance traveled by bus to see if puppy is safe.
Distance during reaction time is 10 m.
Bus decelerates uniformly from 20 m/s to 0 m/s over 5 seconds.
Rectangle area represents constant speed during reaction time, calculated as 10 m.
Triangle area during deceleration is 50 m.
Total distance traveled by bus is 60 m.
Bus travels 15 m beyond puppy's position, puppy is not safe.
